description: The 37-year-old reality star looked absolutely fantastic while on a shopping trip in Los Angeles on Wednesday.
title: Kourtney Kardashian rocks bodysuit and Gucci jogger pants
title_page: Kourtney Kardashian rocks bodysuit and Gucci jogger pants | Daily Mail Online
text:
It has recently been revealed that her ex Scott Disick admitted to being a sex addict.
And Kourtney Kardashian seems to be addicted to something else that starts with an 's'.
The 37-year-old reality star looked absolutely fantastic while on a shopping trip in Los Angeles on Wednesday.
Keeping cool: Kourtney Kardashian was spotted out and about in Los Angeles on Wednesday
The mother-of-three flaunted her fantastic figure in a clinging white bodysuit for the occasion.
As if that wasn't enough she also sported a pair of blue, red, and white wool and silk Gucci jogger pants.
The flowy trousers featuring a striped design down the side featured gold-buttons as they retail for just under $2000.
Looking good: The 37-year-old reality star flaunted her fantastic figure in a clinging white bodysuit for the occasion
Stunner: Her raven-colored tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulders as she let her natural looks show with complimentary make-up including a swipe of shiny pink lip
Gorgeous: Kourtney accessorised the look with a pair of retro-styled shades along with a white leather designer bag
Like what you see? She enjoyed some shopping on the outing
Perusing: She looked to be picking up a few things for her home
Sweet ride: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star also had some hot wheels as she drove around in her gunmetal grey Ashton Martin
Kourtney accessorised the look with a pair of retro-styled shades along with a white leather designer bag.
Her raven-colored tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulders as she let her natural looks show with complimentary make-up including a swipe of shiny pink lip.
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star also had some hot wheels as she drove around in her gunmetal grey Ashton Martin.
Busy day: Earlier in the days he was joined by half-sister Kendall and mother Kris Jenner for lunch at restaurant inside Whizin Market in Agoura Hills, California
Patriotic: She sported a pair of blue, red, and white wool and silk Gucci jogger pants
Pricey: The flowy trousers featuring a striped design down the side featured gold-buttons as they retail for just under $2000
Earlier in the day she was joined by half-sister Kendall and mother Kris Jenner for lunch at restaurant inside Whizin Market in Agoura Hills, California.
Kendall, 21, looked fantastic in yellowwide leg flowing pants which cinched high on the waist which created a ruffle from her own Kendall + Kylie collection.
Kris kept it casual in an all-black ensemble as she enjoyed the meal bonding with her daughters.
Not so mellow yellow: Kendall, 21, looked fantastic in yellowwide leg flowing pants which cinched high on the waist which created a ruffle from her own Kendall + Kylie collection
Lovely in lace: She also sported a silk cami while followed by mother Kris
Dark side: The 61-year-old matriarch sported all-black
The trip comes just days after the explosive Keeping Up With The Kardashians trailer in which on/off partner Scott Disick admitted to being a sex addict.
This all came to a head when longtime partner and mother to his three children, Kourtney Kardashian, had caught him sneaking another girl into a hotel room while on their vacation in Costa Rica.
Next Scott could be heard raising his voice while trying to explain what happened as he exclaimed: 'I'm a sex addict!'
Big revelation: The outing comes just days after Scott Disick said he was a 'sex addict' in the latest Keeping Up With The Kardashians teaser released on Thursday
'She's the love of my life': It seemed like Scott and Kourtney could have been on the verge of reconciliation
Wow factor: Kourtney showed off her fantastic figure in a black bikini as she looked adoringly at Scott
